content:
Hi, I wanted to know if it would be possible to merge the patches [1] for Redmine 5 support for the Zulip plugin?

[1] https://github.com/zulip/zulip-redmine-plugin/pull/38
We don't have any way to test them, but I'm happy to merge them if you've tested that those changes work for you.
We tested them and have used them in production for a weeks now, everything is working again with Redmine 5 and our Zulip instance.
